mapper.select: SELECT a.code,a.name,a.subjection,a.type,b.wsPlanNumber planNum,b.wsEnrollNumber enrollNum, b.wsLowestScore lowestScore ,b.wsLowestRank lowestRanking,b.wsAverageScore averageScore,b.wsAverageRank averageScoresRanking FROM gk_university a left join gk_enroll_report b on a.code = b.universityCode where b.year = #{year} and a.code =#{code} and b.batch = #{batch}

SELECT a.code,a.name,a.subjection,a.type,b.lgPlanNumber planNum,b.lgEnrollNumber enrollNum, b.lgLowestScore lowestScore ,b.lgLowestRank lowestRanking,b.lgAverageScore averageScore,b.lgAverageRank averageScoresRanking FROM gk_university a left join gk_enroll_report b on a.code = b.universityCode where b.year = #{year} and a.code =#{code} and b.batch = #{batch}
